data.title: Kickstarter, Indiegogo Campaign Manager - Upwork
data.description:
We are a fast growing footwear company and looking for a campaign manage to help us setup, launch and manage our crowsource funding for the new styles frequently.

Successfull campaign portfolio is a must.

Please reply with Kickstart to be considered.


Posted On: June 04, 2020 08:24 UTC
Category: Display Advertising
click to apply
